mapper.select:
select * from yb_appeal_manage_view where 1=1 and pid =#{ ybAppealManageView.pid}
and serialNo like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.serialNo} ,'%')
and billNo like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.billNo} ,'%')
and proposalCode like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.proposalCode} ,'%')
and projectCode like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.projectCode} ,'%')
and projectName like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.projectName} ,'%')
and ruleName like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.ruleName} ,'%')
and deductReason like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.deductReason} ,'%')
and repaymentReason like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.repaymentReason} ,'%')
and doctorName like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.doctorName} ,'%')
and deptCode like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.deptCode} ,'%')
and deptName like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.deptName} ,'%')
and hospitalizedNo like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.hospitalizedNo} ,'%')
and treatmentMode like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.treatmentMode} ,'%')
and personalNo like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.personalNo} ,'%')
and insuredName like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.insuredName} ,'%')
and cardNumber like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.cardNumber} ,'%')
and areaName like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.areaName} ,'%')
and versionNumber like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.versionNumber} ,'%')
and backAppeal like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.backAppeal} ,'%')
and typeno =#{ ybAppealManageView.typeno} and applyDateStr like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.applyDateStr} ,'%')
and id =#{ ybAppealManageView.id} and applyDataId =#{ ybAppealManageView.applyDataId} and verifyId =#{ ybAppealManageView.verifyId} and readyDoctorCode like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.readyDoctorCode} ,'%')
and readyDoctorName like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.readyDoctorName} ,'%')
and readyDeptCode like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.readyDeptCode} ,'%')
and readyDeptName like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.readyDeptName} ,'%')
and changeDoctorCode like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.changeDoctorCode} ,'%')
and changeDoctorName like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.changeDoctorName} ,'%')
and changeDeptCode like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.changeDeptCode} ,'%')
and changeDeptName like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.changeDeptName} ,'%')
and operateReason like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.operateReason} ,'%')
AND ybAppealManageView.operateDate >= operateDateFrom}
AND ybAppealManageView.operateDate <= operateDateTo}
and acceptState =#{ ybAppealManageView.acceptState} and refuseName like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.refuseName} ,'%')
and refuseReason like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.refuseReason} ,'%')
AND ybAppealManageView.refuseDate >= refuseDateFrom}
AND ybAppealManageView.refuseDate <= refuseDateTo}
and adminPersonName like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.adminPersonName} ,'%')
AND ybAppealManageView.adminChangeDate >= adminChangeDateFrom}
AND ybAppealManageView.adminChangeDate <= adminChangeDateTo}
and adminReason like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.adminReason} ,'%')
AND ybAppealManageView.enableDate >= enableDateFrom}
AND ybAppealManageView.enableDate <= enableDateTo}
and enableType =#{ ybAppealManageView.enableType} and sourceType =#{ ybAppealManageView.sourceType} and STATE =#{ ybAppealManageView.state} and currencyField like concat('%', #{ ybAppealManageView.currencyField} ,'%')
